title: NewsNews
content:
People living in a Chicago apartment block targeted in a big immigration raid have described seeing armed agents and a helicopter landing on the roof.

Fake AI videos relating to the conflict have gained over 100 million views online, BBC Verify finds.

BBC Verify has debunked videos which purport to show Pakistani attacks on Indian bases and jets crashing.

A clip of Donald Trump Jr allegedly saying on his podcast that the US should have sent arms to Russia rather than Ukraine was very likely generated with AI, experts say.

The BBC's analysis editor looks at a decision that leading Democrats have called "an abuse of power".

Israel's Prime Minister has long warned that Iran is close to developing nuclear weapons. BBC Verify's Ros Atkins explains what we know about its programme.
